title: FS:  T206 Old Mill Breitenstein (Southern Leaguer) PSA 5
author: Anthony S.

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Old Mill Breitenstein (Southern Leaguer) PSA 5
posts.post_content:
FS:

T206 Ted Breitenstein (Old Mill)  PSA 5  EX   MOVED TO EBAY

T206 Jack Bastian  (Old Mill) PSA 3.5  VG+  SOLD

Check or money order, please.

My email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]


PSA 5 Breitenstein has strong corners, no creases or wrinkles, and a slight discoloration underneath the word "Orleans" on the front.

Bastian has a wrinkle/light crease in the upper right back corner of the back (which does not show on the front) that starts at the right border above the two "LL's" in Old Mill and runs diagonally to the top border above the "M" in Mill.  He also has dark circles around his eyes that suggest he was distantly related to a raccoon, but that's true on all T206 Bastians (creepy).
Bump for religious reasons.  And to add close up scans of the PSA 5 Breitenstein.
